info.name: BYO RAG - Document Service Collection
info.description:
Document Management Service API Collection for the BYO RAG System

ðŸ“ **Service URL**: http://localhost:8082 (Docker deployment)
ðŸ“Š **Service Status**: Fully operational with complete document lifecycle management
ðŸ—ï¸ **Architecture**: Multi-format file processing with PostgreSQL persistence and Apache Tika integration

**Core Document Capabilities:**
- Multi-format file upload (PDF, DOCX, TXT, MD, HTML, RTF)
- Apache Tika text extraction with intelligent parsing
- Document chunking for RAG optimization
- Comprehensive metadata management
- Advanced search and filtering capabilities

**Production Features:**
- Complete tenant isolation and security
- Asynchronous processing pipelines
- File size and type validation
- Storage analytics and quotas
- Full audit logging

**Processing Pipeline:**
1. File upload validation and security scanning
2. Apache Tika content extraction
3. Intelligent text chunking for RAG
4. Metadata extraction and indexing
5. Asynchronous embedding generation

**Environment Variables:**
- `DOCUMENT_SERVICE_URL`: http://localhost:8082
- `AUTH_TOKEN`: JWT authentication token
- `TENANT_ID`: Tenant identifier for multi-tenancy
- `DOCUMENT_ID`: Document identifier for operations

formdata.description: Document file to upload (PDF, DOCX, TXT, MD, HTML, RTF)

formdata.value: Comprehensive guide to machine learning algorithms and applications

request.description:
Upload a document for processing and indexing in the RAG system.

**Supported Formats:**
- PDF documents (.pdf)
- Microsoft Word documents (.docx, .doc)
- Plain text files (.txt)
- Markdown files (.md)
- HTML files (.html, .htm)
- Rich text format (.rtf)

**Form Fields:**
- `file`: Document file (required, max 50MB)
- `title`: Document title (optional)
- `description`: Document description (optional)
- `tags`: Comma-separated tags (optional)
- `category`: Document category (optional)

**Processing Pipeline:**
1. File validation and security scanning
2. Apache Tika content extraction
3. Intelligent text chunking
4. Metadata extraction and storage
5. Asynchronous embedding generation

**Response:**
- Document ID for tracking
- Processing status
- Extracted metadata
- File information

request.description:
Upload multiple documents in a single batch operation.

**Form Fields:**
- `files`: Multiple document files (required)
- `category`: Category for all documents (optional)
- `tags`: Common tags for all documents (optional)

**Benefits:**
- Efficient bulk processing
- Consistent metadata application
- Reduced API overhead
- Batch status tracking

**Response:**
- Array of uploaded document information
- Batch processing status
- Individual document IDs

request.description:
Get paginated list of documents with filtering and sorting options.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (0-based, default: 0)
- `size`: Items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
- `sort`: Sort criteria (e.g., createdAt,desc, title,asc)
- `status`: Filter by processing status (UPLOADED, PROCESSING, PROCESSED, FAILED)
- `category`: Filter by document category
- `tags`: Filter by tags (comma-separated)
- `search`: Text search in title and description

**Sorting Options:**
- `createdAt`: Creation timestamp
- `updatedAt`: Last modification
- `title`: Document title
- `fileSize`: File size
- `fileName`: Original filename

**Response:**
- Paginated document list with metadata
- Total count and page information
- Tenant-scoped results only

request.description:
Get specific document details by ID with complete metadata.

**Response Includes:**
- Complete document metadata
- Processing status and statistics
- File information and properties
- Text extraction results
- Chunking and embedding status
- Associated tags and categories
- Upload and modification timestamps

**Security:**
- Document access restricted to owning tenant
- Complete tenant isolation enforced
- User permission validation

request.description:
Update document metadata including title, description, tags, and category.

**Updatable Fields:**
- `title`: Document title
- `description`: Document description
- `tags`: Array of tags
- `category`: Document category

**Behavior:**
- File content cannot be modified (upload new version instead)
- Metadata changes trigger re-indexing
- Audit trail maintained for all changes
- Tenant isolation strictly enforced

**Response:**
- Updated document information
- New modification timestamp
- Processing status if re-indexing triggered

query.description: Permanent deletion (default: false for soft delete)

request.description:
Delete a document and all associated data.

**Query Parameters:**
- `permanent`: Boolean for permanent vs soft delete (default: false)

**Soft Delete (permanent=false):**
- Document marked as DELETED but data retained
- Can be restored within retention period
- Maintains audit trail and compliance

**Permanent Delete (permanent=true):**
- Complete removal of document and associated data
- File deleted from storage
- Embeddings removed from vector database
- Cannot be recovered

**Authorization:**
- Document owner or tenant admin required
- Complete tenant isolation enforced

**Use Cases:**

- Content analysis and review
- Text processing and manipulation
- Quality assurance of extraction

**Security:**

- Document ownership validation
- Complete audit logging

request.description:
Get intelligently chunked text segments optimized for RAG processing.

**Query Parameters:**
- `includeEmbeddings`: Include vector embeddings in response (default: false)

**Response:**
- Array of text chunks with metadata
- Chunk ordering and indexing information
- Token counts and text statistics
- Embedding status for each chunk
- Processing timestamps

**Chunk Properties:**
- `id`: Unique chunk identifier
- `text`: Extracted text content
- `chunkIndex`: Sequential ordering
- `tokenCount`: Number of tokens
- `startPosition`: Position in original text
- `endPosition`: End position in original text
- `embeddingStatus`: Vector generation status

**Use Cases:**
- RAG query context preparation
- Embedding generation validation
- Text analysis and processing
- Quality assurance of chunking

request.description:
Get comprehensive document statistics and analytics for the current tenant.

**Response Metrics:**
- `totalDocuments`: Total number of documents
- `totalSize`: Combined file size in bytes
- `avgDocumentSize`: Average document size
- `documentsByStatus`: Count by processing status
- `documentsByCategory`: Count by document category
- `documentsByFileType`: Count by file type/format
- `processingTimes`: Average processing durations
- `storageUsage`: Storage utilization statistics
- `recentUploads`: Upload activity trends

**Use Cases:**
- Tenant resource monitoring
- Storage quota management
- Performance analytics
- Usage reporting and billing
- System capacity planning

request.description:
Get current document processing status and queue information.

**Response Information:**
- `queueStatus`: Current processing queue status
- `processingQueue`: Number of documents awaiting processing
- `activeProcessing`: Documents currently being processed
- `completedToday`: Documents processed in last 24 hours
- `failedProcessing`: Documents with processing errors
- `averageProcessingTime`: Recent processing performance
- `estimatedWaitTime`: Estimated queue wait time

**Use Cases:**
- Processing queue monitoring
- Performance tracking
- Error identification
- Resource planning
- User progress updates

query.description: Sort by relevance or other fields

request.description:
Search documents using text queries with advanced filtering options.

**Query Parameters:**
- `q`: Search query text (required)
- `page`: Page number (0-based, default: 0)
- `size`: Results per page (default: 20, max: 100)
- `sort`: Sort criteria (relevance,desc | createdAt,desc | title,asc)
- `category`: Filter by document category
- `tags`: Filter by tags (comma-separated)
- `fileType`: Filter by file type (pdf, docx, txt, etc.)
- `dateFrom`: Filter by creation date (from, ISO format)
- `dateTo`: Filter by creation date (to, ISO format)

**Search Features:**
- Full-text search across title, description, and content
- Fuzzy matching for typo tolerance
- Relevance scoring and ranking
- Boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT)
- Phrase searching with quotes
- Wildcard and partial matching

**Response:**
- Paginated search results
- Relevance scores for ranking
- Highlighted search terms
- Complete document metadata
- Search statistics and timing

request.description:
Get popular tags and their usage counts for tag cloud and filtering.

**Query Parameters:**
- `limit`: Maximum number of tags to return (default: 100)

**Response:**
- Array of tags with usage statistics
- Tag names and document counts
- Sorted by popularity (usage count)
- Tenant-scoped tag information

**Use Cases:**
- Tag cloud generation
- Auto-completion for tag input
- Content categorization insights
- Search filter options
- Document organization analysis
